scripts.build-prod: gulp build & cd ./core & npm run build-prod & cd ./../api & npm run build-prod & cd ./../web & npm run build-prod
scripts.clean: gulp --cwd ./core clean & gulp --cwd ./api clean & gulp --cwd ./tests clean
scripts.start: concurrently "gulp --cwd ./core ts & gulp --cwd ./api ts & node ./api/app.js" "cd ./web & ng serve --port 4300"
